input_text:
Job Title: Dental Supply Technician I

Location: Louisville, KY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Department:

Location:

Health Sciences Center

Time Type:

Full time

Worker Type:

Regular

Job Req ID:

R104388

Minimum Requirements:

High School Diploma and three (3) years related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience. Grade 2 (Hourly)

Position Description:

The University of Louisville School of Dentistry prepares students for a career in Dentistry. Programs are available at the DMD level in general dentistry and the master's level in endodontics, orthodontics, pediatric dentistry, periodontics and prosthodontics. Dental Clinic Support employees are an integral part of that preparation in that they provide support to the students in all areas of preclinical and clinical activities, including but not limited to instrument supply, dispensary, sterilization and simulation. In their first two years of studies, students learn in a traditional classroom setting supplemented by simulation and lab experience. During their third and fourth year, students transition to providing care for patients in a live clinic setting. Dental Clinic Support staff directly support the work of the students as they progress towards completion of their pre-clinical and clinical requirements.

The position provides instruments and dental materials to students providing treatment within the DMD clinics on the first floor.

Eligible for $3,000 sign on/ retention bonus

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

Work with the faculty, peers, and supervisors to deliver customer service oriented and patient centered care within the clinics. Dispense instruments, supplies and small equipment to staff and students throughout the dayâ€™s appointments. Check in equipment after use, maintaining inventory for all items that have left the dispensary. Transport soiled instruments, cassettes, and hand pieces to Central Sterilization for processing. Retrieve sterilized instruments from Central Sterilization to the first-floor dispensary for use, maintaining an appropriate level of supply, and replacing as needed. Maintain stock of inner clinic supply locations, ordering replacement supplies as needed. Maintain HIPAA, OSHA, and Infection Control compliance at all times. Other duties as assigned. 

Target Compensation Maximum:

$24.77

Target Compensation Minimum:

$16.51

Compensation Will Be Commensurate To Candidate Experience.

Equal Employment Opportunity

The University of Louisville is an equal opportunity, affirmative action employer, and is committed to providing employment opportunities to all qualified applicants without regard to race, sex, age, color, national origin, ethnicity, creed, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity and expression, marital status, pregnancy, or veteran status. If you are unable to use our online application process due to an impairment or disability, please contact the Employment team at employment@louisville.edu or 502.852.6258.

Assistance and Accommodations

Computers are available for application submission at the Human Resources Department located at 215 Central Avenue, Ste 205 - Louisville, Kentucky 40208.

If you require assistance or accommodation with our online application process, please contact us by email at employment@louisville.edu or by phone 502-852-6258.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
